title: Books About Corporate Weblogs
content: Hi guys. Does anyone know a good book about Business Blogs resp. Corporate Weblogs? Or an outstanding book about Blogs in general? Thanks. Ivo
author: Ivo

comments.content:
Hi there. Don't know if it's much use to you, but there is a recently published book called _[Ultimate Blogs: Masterworks from the Wild Web](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109012004/http:/www.amazon.com/Ultimate-Blogs-Masterworks-Vintage-Original/dp/0307278069/ref=sr_1_8?ie=UTF8&s=books&qid=1206146798&sr=1-8)_.

Oh, and here's another one I saw at a store the other day... _[Blogging Heroes: Interviews with 30 of the World's Top Bloggers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109012004/http:/www.amazon.com/Blogging-Heroes-Interviews-Worlds-Bloggers/dp/0470197390/ref=pd_bxgy_b_text_b)_.

Thank you Ricardo. I read these books a little bit at the store, but these are not the kind I’m searching for. I need more theoretical information about these things. Actually I ordered some books especially about Corporate/Business Blogs now. Will see …
A poem about books about blogs would be a great way to suss out the nuances a book about blogs might not capture.
